name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Self Crypto Wallet: ETH, BTC, KDA & more!

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Everything in the blockchain made easy

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Web3 non-custodial wallet extension offers secure and convenient cryptocurrency management with support for multiple blockchain networks (multichain). A key feature is self name resolution, which allows users to send crypto using self names that are automatically converted to the recipient's address. This innovative functionality enhances user experience by simplifying transactions and improving address management.
